name: Space Racing
overview: In the year 2560, humanity has spread throughout the universe, coming into contact with different forms of life, and establishing fruitful cultural and technological relationships, as well as commercial ones. The billionaires of this time, bored tiwh their emotionless way of life, devised a new entertainment based on the old formula 1 races. The new races tiwh ships and circuits full of traps and dangers, began to be called Space Racing. Nobody wanted to participate in this madness, so they looked for prisoners to be pilots. The prize for winning and not dying trying is your freedom. Good luck!
